== '''HARMONIE 35h0''' ==
 (UNDER DEVELOPMENT)
[[Center(end)]]

== Highlights of Harmonie 35h0 ==

Harmonie 35h0 is currently under development, it is an HARMONIE system adaptation to the IFS/ALADIN  cycle 35.

HARMONIE is the acronym for Hirlam's meso-scale forecast system (Hirlam Aladin Regional/Meso-scale Operational NWP In Europe). The HARMONIE system is the product of the HIRLAM-ALADIN joint project HARMONIE: Hirlam-Aladin Research towards Meso-scale Operational NWP in Europe.

The highlights of Harmonie 35h0 include
 * features in cycle 35
 * Hirlam source code updates
 * Hirlam scripts update
